short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search the selected text on the current site

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Search the selection text on the current site.

Note: 
- You can only search for websites on our search site data.Otherwise, the extension will use your browser's default search engine.
- You can also send us the website that you think is useful when using this extension, then we will update that website to our search site data.

(Request site form: https://forms.gle/PwouJTs8PJqeE9HR6)
